REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1337 reute d f BC-MANOR-CARE-<MNR>-RAIS 10-20 0060

TEXT.TITLE: MANOR CARE <MNR> RAISES SHARE REPURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Manor Care Inc said it has raised its share repurchase program to include four mln additional shares, raising the total number under the program to five mln. It said it h already repurchased the first one mln shares outhorized. Manor Care now has about 40 mln shares outstanding. Reuter
